Articles.Content: Hi all, I think I am doing something wrong. I've set up a Mun base using a hitchhiker crew container but once the kerbals go in I can't get them back out. The "brain" of the base is one of the robotic drones and even if I right click the crew hatch nothing nothing happens... any help would be appreciated! Thanks~

Hi all, I think I am doing something wrong. I've set up a Mun base using a hitchhiker crew container but once the kerbals go in I can't get them back out. The "brain" of the base is one of the robotic drones and even if I right click the crew hatch nothing nothing happens... any help would be appreciated! Thanks~

Try left clicking on a hatch. Also you can send a Kerbal on EVA by clicking on the button that appears on their thumbnail on the bottom right when you hover the cursor over it.
Their portraits disappear once they go into the hitchhiker though. Left clicking on the hatch is the way to do it

The "Crew Hatch" text needs to appear, so you might have to mouse around a bit for it to show and it might not be directly on the door itself.

Also, if you are using OSX Leopard there is an incompatibility with Unity3D, you need to use Windowed mode and keep clicking the desktop, or upgrade to Lion
